complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the analysis into specific areas: functionality, design patterns, errors, technology stack, accessibility, security, and performance. Create separate subtasks for each area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires detailed investigation and documentation across multiple aspects of the existing file. Splitting into subtasks allows for focused analysis.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Basic HTML Structure with Dark Theme and Bootstrap
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into creating the HTML boilerplate, integrating Bootstrap and Font Awesome, creating the dark theme CSS, and setting up the custom JavaScript file.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves setting up the basic structure and integrating external libraries. Subtasks will help manage the different components.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the user management implementation into creating the HTML structure, implementing add/edit/delete forms, displaying user data, defining API endpoints, and implementing error handling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple UI elements, API interactions, and data handling. Subtasks will help manage the complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the report generation implementation into creating the HTML structure, implementing date range and user selection, generating the report, displaying data, and defining the API endpoint.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Involves UI components, data retrieval, and display. Subtasks will help manage the different aspects of the report generation process.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the settings configuration into creating the HTML structure, implementing the settings form, handling data persistence, and defining the API endpoint.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Requires UI development and data persistence. Subtasks will help manage the different settings and their storage.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Test Functionality and Ensure Proper Operation
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide testing into form validation, navigation, data display, accessibility, responsiveness, and error handling. Create separate subtasks for each area.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Comprehensive testing is crucial and covers multiple aspects of the application. Subtasks will ensure thorough coverage.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the consistency maintenance into design pattern review, ensuring consistency, integration with existing application, and code review.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Ensuring consistency requires careful review and integration. Subtasks will help manage the different aspects of maintaining consistency.
